page.title: 10Garden machinery
page.content: As our area is mainly grassland,and houses have big gardens,garden machinery is very important.In Plaitford there is a garden machinery business. Some lawnmowers come with grassboxes,some are big and some are small.Some are mains electric,and some are petrol engines.Electric mowers are usually small,and have a flex and you have to push them along.Electric mowers are quite dangerous because you could runover the flex.The motors quite often burn out if you use them toolong.Electric mowers cost fifty pounds too one hundred and fifty pounds Self_Propelled petrol mowers are very powerful.They have grass boxes and some have blades under the deck,and others have a rotating blade.
